headline: Is Costco Wholesale (COST) Pricing Reflect Lofty P/E After Strong Multi‑Year Share Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Costco Wholesale's current share price fairly reflects the business you see every time you walk through its warehouses, this piece walks you through what the numbers are actually saying about value. The stock recently closed at US$968.36, with a 13.3% return over the last 30 days, a 1% decline over the last 7 days, a 13.3% return year to date, a 3.1% decline over the last year, a 95.6% return over 3 years, and a 184.3% return over 5 years. headline: Costco's Membership Model Continues to Deliver Predictable Growth

headline: Walmart Joins $1 Trillion Club as Tech, Frugal Shoppers Fuel Gains
summary: The stock rose as much as 1.6% as of 9:45 a.m. in New York trading, reaching an intraday record of $126 per share and lifting its market value to just over $1 trillion, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.  The Bentonville, Arkansas-based chain — a longtime favorite of bargain-hunting consumers — has flexed its massive scale and supplier network to keep prices low and grab market share across the income spectrum.  While Walmart has maintained its appeal to households looking for value, its online offerings are drawing new, wealthier shoppers seeking convenience.

While Walmart has maintained its appeal to households looking for value, its online offerings are drawing new, wealthier shoppers seeking convenience.

headline: Nine Out of Ten Costco Members Renew: Inside the Metric That Powers a $14B Profit Engine
summary: Costco Wholesale Corp (NASDAQ:COST) just reported something remarkable: a 92.3% renewal rate in the US and Canada, with 89.8% worldwide. That’s not just a metric. It’s the entire business model distilled into two numbers. Most retailers live and die by comparable sales or margin expansion. Costco’s stickiness lives in membership renewal. When nine out of ... Nine Out of Ten Costco Members Renew: Inside the Metric That Powers a $14B Profit Engine

headline: Costco Lawsuit Tests Kirkland Trust On No Preservatives Chicken Claim
summary: Costco Wholesale (NasdaqGS:COST) is facing a nationwide class action lawsuit over claims that its Kirkland Signature Rotisserie Chicken is advertised as having "No Preservatives" despite allegedly containing additives that act as preservatives. The lawsuit centers on alleged misleading labeling and advertising practices that plaintiffs argue could misinform consumers who are seeking clean-label or preservative free products. The case raises questions about Costco’s consumer transparency,...

headline: Costco has a gift card problem as key partner goes bankrupt
summary: While gift cards seem like an easy gift, and buying discounted gift cards at Costco adds value, they only make sense if people actually use them. My gift card pile at home has at least a couple from restaurants and retailers that no longer operate. That's actually pretty typical, and it happens ...
